data.title: An Alright Taco Bell
data.text: I've been here manymany times and it is mostly just the way it should be. Decent food...fair prices...usually correct orders. We stopped in for an early dinner recently. It was very quiet when we arrived and ordered immediately. My taco salad was pretty good. It could have used a bit more lettuce/tomato/sour cream...but not bad at all. This item seems to be somewhat higher than it was the last time I ordered it...which wasn't all that long ago. This is alright...but...it's not like I was getting more...or better...food for the extra money. I like that they offer a drink 'Happy Hour' from 3PM-5PM. You get select medium sized drinks for just $1.00. I always forget this...but their employees are fantastic about reminding you if you order a more expensive drink. Nice gesture. The restaurant is normally well-kept...clean floors...trash not overflowing...tables food-free. When I do run into issues at this location...it involves the drive-thru. Not every time...but frequently. It's normally the speed of how quickly the line moves. I've waited upwards of 10 minutes in line to get my order...after placing it. I realize things can happen...but that's ridiculous. Overall though...it's an alright location. It has an outdoor dining patio for weather-permitting months...that's a nice plus. We'll always stop in for a quick bite.

data.title: Our first time
data.text: To give a proper perspective of my rating, my wife and I are Asians who just arrived at Minneapolis after a 19 hours trip and this was the nearest food available from where we stayed at the hotel. That being said, the whatever we ordered, we made sure we had different orders, that was suppose to have chicken and beef meat did not taste like chicken or beef. We did not like it at all.

data.title: Sometimes, at 12:30 in the morning, you just have to Crush some Taco Bell
data.text:
Unfortunately, all too often, at about 6 the next morning, Taco Bell will Crush you back.

Its worth it.

data.title: Gotta have it ;o)
data.text: We should get Taco Bell in Norway, I love it! Can´t travel to the States without having Taco Bell. I get my tacos just how I want them, a variation of choises,-best taco ever

data.title: Fresco Chicken Taco
data.text: Fresco Chicken Taco at Taco Bell is the best invention EVER - love this idea and it saves on the caloric intake as well.
